name: Drone & Fighter Support
desc: JYD relies on their drones and fighters and commissioned ships have been improved by lowering their replacement time by %s/%s/%s/%s, depending on hull size. These adjustments require less flight crew to operate, lowering skeleton crew requirements by %s.
short: Improves flight bay performance with redcued replacement time and fewer crew needed

name: Exploration Refit
desc: JYD engineers love to tinker and can refit any civilian ship for exploration. This mod removes the penalties from a civilian-grade hull, increases the maximum burn level by %s, sensor and sight range are increased by %s, increases cargo space by %s and the ship has been shielded against cosmic hazards, reducing CR loss from corona and similar conditions by %s. In order to maintain these upgrades the ship requires %s more crew and uses %s more supplies per month.
short: Removes civ dmods and incraeases exploration stats
